_sText:
Surf_thriller2
Created by Buck Nasty
-------------------------
- Since the feedback from the original version (surf_thriller) was good, I decided to do a fixed up version.
- Fixes:
   - guns with ammo
   - weapons and nades start constrained
   - lighting
   - removal of a few advertisements
   - water platforms carved into the ground to prevent cratering
   - added weapon M3 and P90

- This map plays very good on RPG surf servers and on regular surf servers!
- I will keep the older version on FPSB for the people who may prefer it over this one.

- Check out my surf shack, this map is in its cycle:
130.101.226.250:27014
-Xfire = bucknastier

-Enjoy!
-- Buck Nasty

http://waspnest.net
http://solidsurf.info
